AU.name: YO-KAI WATCH™ 2: Bony Spirits
AU.description: Bonus for purchasing on Nintendo eShop: "F Series Bell" (AOC) Get set for a heroic new YO-KAI WATCH adventure of time travel, exploration and never-before-seen Yo-kai! YO-KAI WATCH 2: Bony Spirits provides a brand new quirky journey of discovery, featuring story-driven RPG gameplay, and jam-packed with expanded quests, activities, and over 350 new and returning Yo-kai to find, befriend and defeat! Travel back in time to 60 years in the past, teaming up with heroic cat Hovernyan to uncover the origin of the Yo-kai Watch… For the first time, you can battle friends using local wireless, or over an internet connection, and also team up and play co-op multiplayer in Yo-kai Watch Blasters mode (local wireless only). Upon the purchase of YO-KAI WATCH 2: Bony Spirits on Nintendo eShop, you can also get a code that gives you a chance to battle and befriend Robonyan-F! The world of Yo-kai just got a whole lot bigger... Get set to embark on a journey of MEGA(NYAN) proportions! Supports 2 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play
